SageTVPlugin.Name: WIconsAPI
SageTVPlugin.Description: WIcons API- Do not install directly - just a dependency for Diamond!
SageTVPlugin.Author: jusjoken
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
- 1.006 - NO CHANGES - moved the source files from Google Code to BinTray (under Diamond Legacy)
- 1.004 - added some missing icons and support for new png url icons from NWS
- 1.003 - add a missing icon and made NWS to use night icons for night forecasts
